academicCatalogRelations.justification: Direct match on full name returned by search_infoscience_authors_tool. ORCID matches profile. Affiliation inferred from publications and lab.
Listed under Petras Vestartasâ€™s publications on Infoscience.

entity.title: Laser Scanning with Industrial Robot Arm for Raw-wood Fabrication
entity.abstract: This paper presents an integrated raw-wood fabrication workflow using an industrial robot arm and a laser scanner. The research is situated in a Swiss mountain forestry context where timber in its natural form could be applied locally without relying on large centralized timber industries.

academicCatalogRelations.justification: Conference paper by Vestartas on Infoscience with DOI.

entity.title: Design-to-Fabrication Workflow for Raw-Sawn-Timber using Joinery Solver
entity.abstract: Currently, the Swiss timber industry in mountain areas largely exports unprocessed lumber and imports finished timber products due to the lack of digital tools. By using new digital design-to-production workflows, it is possible to investigate new building systems for small-scale structures using local resources.

academicCatalogRelations.justification: Doctoral thesis authored solely by Vestartas with DOI from Infoscience.

entity.title: Joinery Solver for Whole Timber Structures
entity.abstract: This paper presents a digital joinery generation method for whole-timber structures using wood-wood connections. The research is based on a collaboration with a local timber company located in a mountain area.

academicCatalogRelations.justification: Conference paper listed under Vestartasâ€™s Infoscience publications.

entity.title: Structural design methodology in Integrally-Attached Timber Plate structures
entity.abstract: The immediate application of research discoveries requires a global and exact understanding of the structure under consideration. academicCatalogRelations.justification: Book chapter co-authored by Vestartas with DOI, retrieved from Infoscience.

entity.title: Parametric Workshop
entity.abstract: This bi-annual workshop is an introduction to parametric design for Master 1 students following Studio Weinand. entity.title: Robotically-Fabricated Nexorades from Whole Timber
entity.abstract: This paper introduces the conceptual design of sustainable timber structures using raw wood. It presents a workflow for systematically generating Nexorades using a tiling method for multi-valence quad subdivided surfaces.

academicCatalogRelations.justification: Conference paper by Vestartas in Infoscience publications list.

entity.title: Design framework for the structural analysis of free-form timber plate structures using wood-wood connections
entity.abstract: Geometrically complex timber plate structures using wood-wood connections are increasingly designed thanks to digital fabrication.
